original_text: Then, you let that person give nothing to his parents. He does not have to help them. This shows that you have not obeyed what God says is right. Instead, you have obeyed your own ideas.
korean_text: 그 부모를 공경할 것이 없다 하여 너희의 전통으로 하나님의 말씀을 폐하는도다

sentences.original_text: Then, you let that person give nothing to his parents.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너는 그가 자기 부모에게 아무것도 주지 못하게 한다.

sentences.original_text: He does not have to help them.
This shows that you have not obeyed what God says is right.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 네가 하나님께서 옳다고 하신 것을 순종하지 않았음을 보여준다.

sentences.original_text: Instead, you have obeyed your own ideas.
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에, 너는 너 자신의 생각을 따랐다.
